channel.title: Kenneth Pobo on The Bombay Literary Magazine
channel.description: Recent content in Kenneth Pobo on The Bombay Literary Magazine

item.title: Two poems – by Kenneth Pobo
item.description: Petaled Geography We grow plants uncommon in Pennsylvania. Like cotton. Cotton bolls, our own bit of Georgia. Did they miss red soil? And plumeria, Hawaii in a container. Salmon-colored blossoms. We’ve never been to Hawaii so we brought it here. Red adeniums, Madagascar beside our shed. Tall Mexican sunflowers call to us each morning. Orange, a song which they will teach us. Mexico on a thick stalk. In late fall,
